```{r setup}
library(snackman)
library(ReinforcementLearning)
library(stringr)
```
This demo demonstrates the train_ai_model

```{r, fig.show='hold'}

arena <- create_test_arena()$layout
policy <- computePolicy(train_ai_model(create_test_player(),create_test_arena()))


for(i in 1:length(policy)) {
action <-  policy[[i]]
pos <- as.numeric(str_split(names(policy[i]), pattern = " ")[[1]])
y <- pos[1]
x <- pos[2]
arena[y,x] <- action
}

y <- create_test_player()$y
x <- create_test_player()$x
arena[y,x] <- "player"

arena

```
